data.title: Paramax Corporation advised Towne Automotive Group (“Towne”) on the sale of Towne Alfa Romeo and Towne Maserati franchise operations to Maranello Sports USA Inc. ​​​​​​​
data.meta_description: About the Transaction Towne Automotive Group, led by Franklin G. Downing, Jr., has been one of Western New [...]Read More...
data.text:
About the Transaction

Towne Automotive Group, led by Franklin G. Downing, Jr., has been one of Western New York’s most widely recognized and trusted automotive groups for more than 50 years. Towne will continue to own and operate 15 brands of new vehicle franchises throughout WNY. Towne prides itself on delivering a customer experience which returns not only satisfaction but earns continued customer loyalty.
